title: Bakemono no Ko (The Boy and the Beast)
synopsis: Two souls, living very different lives, wander alone and isolated in their respective worlds. For nine-year-old Ren, the last person who treated him with any form of kindness has been killed and he is shunned by what is left of his family. With no parents, no real family, and no place to go, Ren escapes into the confusing streets and alleyways of Shibuya. Through the twists and turns of the alleys, Ren stumbles into the intimidating Kumatetsu, who leads him to the beast realm of Shibuten.
related_anime: ['Green Dakara x Bakemono no Ko', 'Bakemono no Ko']
voices: ['Yakusho, Kouji', 'Miyazaki, Aoi', 'Hirose, Suzu', 'Morohoshi, Sumire', 'Miyano, Mamoru', 'Oizumi, Yo', 'Franky, Lily', 'Yamaji, Kazuhiro', 'Tsugawa, Masahiko', 'Nagatsuka, Keishi']
